name: 蔣欣翰
objective:
本課程針對車輛控制系統的理論與實務相關內容進行介紹，並聚焦在自動駕駛車輛的發展技術，課程內容包括雷達及視覺感測、導航與定位技術、運動控制與控制決策以及自動駕駛車輛的能源動力系統。此外課程內容也會探討車聯網技術、自駕車產業化以及從自駕車對智慧交通的轉變與影響。
This course introduces the theories and practical aspects related to vehicle control systems, focusing on the development technologies of autonomous vehicles. The course content includes radar and vision sensing, navigation and positioning technologies, motion control and decision-making, and the energy power systems of autonomous vehicles. Additionally, the course will explore vehicle-to-vehicle communication technology, the industrialization of autonomous vehicles, and the transition and impact of autonomous vehicles on e-mobility in smart cities.
